channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: WhatsApp to launch third-party chat integration in Europe soon
item.description: Users in Europe who have opted in to the third-party integration will be able to share messages, images, voice messages, videos and files.

item.title: CISA warns exploited Cisco flaws are a serious risk, so patch now
item.description: Some agencies failed to properly apply Cisco patch and thought they were safe, CISA warns.

item.title: In Ancient Egypt, Opium Was a ‘Fixture of Daily Life,’ Study Suggests
item.description: Researchers analyzed brown residue in an incredibly rare alabaster vase.

item.title: 8 Best MagSafe Phone Grips (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Take the strain off with these comfortable, durable, and lightweight smartphone grips.

item.title: All MAGA Wanted Was the Epstein Files. Now They're Ignoring Them
item.description: For years, MAGA influencers demanded the release of the Epstein files. Now that 20,000 documents have been released, many raising questions about Donald Trump, they're shrugging.

item.title: Pine Labs gets warm market welcome on $440M India IPO despite a valuation trim
item.description: Pine Labs, backed by PayPal and Mastercard, gained 14% on its market debut.

item.title: Photoshop ou Excel sur un Chromebook ? Google a une arme pour (enfin) faire tourner les apps Windows
item.description: Google relance Cameyo, sa solution pour « streamer » les apps Windows sur ChromeOS. L'objectif : faire sauter le « verrou applicatif » qui empêche les entreprises de quitter Windows.

item.title: What you see is how you feel: how smarter displays shape the way we work and feel
item.description: The role of smarter monitors in reducing strain and supporting wellness in today’s digital-first workplaces.

item.title: Black Friday PC portables : la sélection des 12 meilleures offres sur les laptops bureautiques et gaming d’Apple, Asus, MSI…
item.description: Besoin d’un nouvel ordinateur portable ? Que vous recherchiez une machine bureautique ou un modèle taillé pour le gaming, il y en a pour tous les goûts durant l’avant-première du Black Friday. Les marques phares comme Apple, Asus, HP, Lenovo ou encore MSI affichent déjà de belles réductions, pour tous les budgets et tous les usages.

item.title: Pixel 10 Pro Fold review: Google’s bet to make foldables sturdy
item.description: Google’s Pixel 10 Pro Fold improves durability with a tighter hinge, IP68 rating, a bigger battery and brighter display, but its weaker camera system compared to the Pixel 10 Pro muddy its “Pro” branding.

item.title: The UK’s broken energy system could burst its AI bubble
item.description: Outdated energy infrastructure threatens to pull the plug on Britain’s AI dream.

item.title: Ne mettez pas à jour votre Switch 2 si vous avez un dock non officiel
item.description: La dernière mise à jour de la Nintendo Switch 2, numérotée 21.0.0, semble empêcher les docks non officiels de fonctionner. De nombreux modèles sont impactés.

item.title: Xiaomi profite du pré-Black Friday pour brader ses produits les plus populaires : les 16 offres à saisir
item.description: Xiaomi n’a pas attendu longtemps pour casser les prix lors du pré-Black Friday. De nombreux modèles phares de la marque sont concernés, même les plus récentes, comme le 15T. Dans cette sélection, vous trouverez les meilleurs produits du constructeur chinois aux meilleurs prix.

item.title: Why You’ve Seen Way Less ‘Wicked: For Good’ Press Memes and Way More Merch
item.description: Holding space has given up space for a lot more bizarre brand collaborations.

item.title: Akira ransomware is now targeting Nutanix VMs - and scoring big rewards
item.description: Akira ransomware hackers are expanding their reach - and increasing their profits.

item.title: The Running Man is a propulsive tribute to ’80s action movies
item.description: When The Running Man was first published in 1982 under Stephen King's Richard Bachman pseudonym, the United States was just beginning to feel the impacts of then-president Ronald Reagan's neoliberal economic policies. Under Reaganomics, massive tax breaks for the wealthy and deep cuts to social safety programs like food stamps and Medicaid drastically intensified income […]...

item.title: Counting Renaissance butts in Rome with the Meta Ray-Ban Display
item.description: This is Optimizer, a weekly newsletter sent every Friday from Verge senior reviewer Victoria Song that dissects and discusses the latest phones, smartwatches, apps, and other gizmos that swear they're going to change your life. Optimizer arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 10AM ET. Opt in for Optimizer here. It's a truth universally acknowledged that […]...

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Saturday, November 15 (game #622)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Saturday, November 15 (game #1391)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Saturday, November 15 (game #888)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: 7 new movies and TV shows to watch on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max and more this weekend (November 14)
item.description: The weekend has arrived, and these are the new movies and shows you'll want to watch before Monday rolls around.

item.title: Black Friday audio : les écouteurs sans fil, casques, barres de son et enceintes montent le volume et baissent leur prix dans ce top des offres
item.description: Apple AirPods, Sony, JBL Charge, Marshall, Nothing, Bowers & Wilkins... Les grandes marques de l'audio bradent leurs écouteurs, casques, enceintes, barres de son et autres pendant l'avant-première du Black Friday. Voici notre sélection des meilleures offres pour vous faire plaisir.

item.title: Bbox fit : tout ce qu’il faut savoir sur la box internet pas chère de Bouygues Telecom
item.description: Éligible à la fibre de Bouygues Telecom sans pour autant vouloir dépenser des mille et des cents dans l'abonnement internet ? La Bbox fit est l'offre fibre la moins chère de l'opérateur, elle s'accompagne d'une box internet en Wi-Fi 6. Voici tout ce qu'il faut savoir à son sujet.

item.title: ‘This is the right time to retire’: Walmart CEO Doug McMillon steps down. Retail giant names new boss
item.description: The change in leadership follows a similar sequence of past transitions at the company, with McMillon saying on for a while in an advisory capacity. There’s a new sheriff in Bentonville.

item.title: These are the only early Black Friday earbuds and headphones deals worth buying – and I know because I tested them all (and rated them highly) in 2025
item.description: On Black Friday, there are earbuds deals that save you a bit of money, and there are genuine bargains –so let's go for option two, shall we?

item.title: The MLB betting scandal is putting a spotlight on a multimillion-dollar industry in the Dominican Republic
item.description: Officials say that for every legal bet in the Caribbean country, there exist countless illegal ones. Baseball and bets go hand-in-hand in the Dominican Republic, where professional athletes, musicians and even legislators go public with their wagers.But for every legal bet in the Caribbean country, officials say there are countless more illegal ones.It’s a widespread, multimillion-dollar industry that has come under scrutiny following U.S. federal indictments of Cleveland Guardians pitchers Emmanuel Clase and Luis Ortiz. They are accused of taking bribes from unnamed sports bettors in the Domi...

item.title: Google Call Recording launches on more Pixel phones
item.description: Google is now widely rolling out Call Recording to Pixel 6 and newer devices that don’t support the Gemini Nano-powered Call Notes feature found in the Pixel 9 and 10’s Phone app, as spotted by 9to5Google. Google first announced the expansion of the Call Recording feature in September. It should be available after you update […]

item.title: WhatsApp accueille enfin d’autres messageries en Europe
item.description: WhatsApp s'ouvre à des messageries concurrentes en Europe, comme l'exige le DMA. L'application de Meta commence avec deux alternatives, BirdyChat et Haiket, ce qui va permettre aux utilisateurs de partager messages texte et audio, photos, vidéos et documents peu importe leur messagerie de prédilection.

item.title: Meta must rein in scammers — or face consequences
item.description: Meta, the largest social media company in the world, knowingly makes billions from scam ads, recent reporting on the company says. According to internal documents revealed by Reuters, users of Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp see 15 billion ads a day promoting scams, from fake Trump stimulus checks to deepfakes of Elon Musk hawking cryptocurrency. The […]...

item.title: Apple TV is getting a great free MLS upgrade – and some lucky fans will also get Apple’s streaming service for free
item.description: Apple is doing away with the MLS Season Pass and including the games as part of a standard Apple TV subscription.

item.title: Forget Black Friday streaming deals, this Hulu bundle expires in 4 days and it’s one of the best offers of the year
item.description: Don't wait for Black Friday, the best Hulu deal of the year is here, but it's ending soon.

item.title: Le Single Day AliExpress se poursuit, mais plus pour longtemps : voici les meilleures offres high-tech à saisir [Sponso]
item.description: Connaissez-vous le Single Day ? Venue de Chine, cette fête propulsée en France par AliExpress est une occasion rêvée pour faire le plein de bonnes affaires. Découvrez les meilleurs bons plans tech de cette journée devenue iconique.

item.title: Black Friday : la crème des offres sur les smartphones premium (Apple, Samsung, Google…)
item.description: Cela commence à devenir une tradition chez les e-commerçants, le Black Friday commence tôt, et même très tôt. Depuis deux semaines, les promotions pleuvent sur les Samsung Galaxy, iPhone, Xiaomi et Google Pixel et ça ne se calme pas ! Voici les meilleures offres sur les smartphones premium.

item.title: 15 Best Camera Accessories for Phones (2025): Tripods, Mics, and Lights
item.description: From mobile lenses to wireless mics, here’s everything you need for your portable, pro-grade photo or video studio.

item.title: The Meta Quest 3S is $50 off and comes with a $50 gift card and a game
item.description: You don’t have to wait two more weeks to pick up a great gadget as a gift; early Black Friday deals are in full swing. Case in point: Best Buy is offering the 128GB Meta Quest 3S for $249 ($50 off) along with a $50 gift card and a copy of The Walking Dead: Saints […]

item.title: Samsung casse les prix de ses meilleurs produits Galaxy durant le pré-Black Friday
item.description: Le pré-Black Friday a débuté il y a plus d’une semaine et les produits Samsung n’ont pas été épargnés. Des références récentes telles que le Galaxy S25 Ultra profite de remises inédites, ce qui permet de s’équiper avec la dernière génération à moindre coût pendant toute cette période promotionnelle.

item.title: Incroyable mais vrai : si vous recevez un mail de Taylor Swift, c’est probablement une arnaque
item.description: Le géant des antivirus McAfee dévoile son classement 2025 des célébrités les plus exploitées par les pirates pour vous piéger et vous soutirer de l’argent.

item.title: Verizon reportedly set to cut as many as 15,000 jobs
item.description: Thousands could lose their jobs as Verizon stores turn into franchise stores and management departs.

item.title: Bad Bunny wins album of the year and more at the 2025 Latin Grammys
item.description: Bad Bunny’s landmark release ‘Debí Tirar Más Fotos’ won album of the year. It should come as a shock to no one: The 2026 Latin Grammy Awards were all about Bad Bunny. The Puerto Rican superstar won album of the year for his landmark release “Debí Tirar Más Fotos.” After thanking his family and all those who worked on the album, he ended his speech with “Puerto Rico, I love you, thank you.”Those are powerful words honoring a record that doubles as a love letter for his island.The artist born Benito Antonio Martínez Ocasio was destined to dominate from the jump. He also won the first award of t...

item.title: ‘Metroid Prime 4: Beyond’ Puts the Switch 2’s Controls to its Biggest Test
item.description: Psychic Samus in 'Metroid Prime 4' isn't nearly as interesting as mouse mode.

item.title: I Can’t Stop Staring at the Hilariously Horrifying Moopsy Death Animation From ‘Star Trek Online’
item.description: In MMORPG space, no one can hear your bones get schlorped out by a cute little critter. But they *can* hear said critter say 'Moopsy.'

item.title: Amazon’s Fire Tablets, Tested, So You Don’t Have To (2025)
item.description: Whether you need a travel-friendly slate or something affordable for the kids, we tested every model to find the right one for every occasion.

item.title: TikTok users can now share tracks and more from Amazon Music
item.description: With a new "Share to TikTok" button, Amazon Music users can share songs, albums, playlists, and personal listening highlights from their Insights on Amazon Music directly to TikTok.

item.title: How to watch BBC Children in Need 2025 online from anywhere for free
item.description: Star-studded sketches, shocks and surprises and show-stopping performances. Here's how to watch Children in Need 2025 online, on TV and from anywhere in the world.

item.title: After years of waiting, I’ve finally tried Metroid Prime 4: Beyond – and after just two hours of play, I’m seriously excited for release day
item.description: I spent a couple of hours with Metroid Prime 4: Beyond and its hypnotic atmosphere, smooth combat, and rewarding puzzles had me hooked.

item.title: The Seduction debuts on HBO Max today – but one star is already worried that you won't tune in after episode 1
item.description: The Seduction is the new French historical drama dropping on HBO Max on a weekly basis, but one star is convinced nobody will tune in after episode 1.

item.title: Metroid Prime 4 looks and feels great, but Im nervous about one little thing
item.description: The first 'Metroid Prime' game in nearly two decades is as exciting a prospect as ever, but after playing it, I have questions.

item.title: Rejoice! Jack Dorsey (Who Killed Vine) Is Resurrecting Vine
item.description: The fun is back.

item.title: En France, le navigateur Opera cartonne sur iOS grâce au DMA
item.description: Le DMA, ça marche. C'est du moins le point de vue d'Opera, en contrepoint total d'Apple qui continue sa guerre de tranchée contre le règlement sur les marchés numériques. Le navigateur alternatif a enregistré une forte croissance en Europe ces deux dernières années.

item.title: JBL Clip 5 : cette excellente mini-enceinte notée 9/10 est à moitié prix pendant le pré-Black Friday
item.description: Après une quatrième itération de sa mini-enceinte à mousqueton très réussie, JBL a dévoilé l'an dernier sa Clip 5, une référence qui offre notamment une puissance acoustique presque doublée. Un modèle que l'on a beaucoup apprécié, et que l'on trouve, pendant le pré-Black Friday, à 37,10 euros au lieu de 69,99 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: Hot tech stocks are tumbling: Why Tesla, Palantir, Nvidia, and others are leading a market sell-off today
item.description: After emerging from the government shutdown unscathed, some of the most high-profile technology and AI stocks are taking a hit on Friday. The stock market survived the longest government shutdown in U.S. history with minimal impact. But it tumbled on Thursday, November 13, amid a sell-off of tech stocks as worries about overinflated values and interest rate cuts grew. ...

item.title: « Une facture à zéro euro » : cette offre d’électricité inédite arrive en France
item.description: Qui refuserait une facture d’électricité annuelle réduite à… zéro euro ? C’est pourtant ce que promet Octopus Energy avec sa nouvelle offre, qui garantit au moins cinq années sans facture d’électricité. Des conditions sont à remplir cependant pour en profiter.

item.title: Valve made Microsoft’s dream console
item.description: Microsoft keeps describing this model for the future of a game console that sounds great for players: it's as easy as a console, it can play a huge library of PC titles, and it even supports third-party stores. That'd be a wonderful product if someone could build it, and it sure looks like Valve has […]

item.title: Woman Marries ChatGPT-Generated Groom Through Breach in the Metaverse
item.description: More and more people want to make it official with their computer-generated lovers.
